column5: Hey everyone, I am going to Scugog on saturday to go muskie fishing for the first time. Can anyone suggest good spots where they will be located as well as good lures to use there? Any suggestions are helpful! Thanks
I've had luck pretty much anywhere on the lake. Orange seems to be the hot color lately.
Try orange & black bucktails or orange stalkers/super stalkers
I hope the OP has the appropriate gear to deal with those bigguns!  You don't wanna be fishing them with bass gear
It's Scugog. There's nothing in there a bass rod won't handle.
i have never tried scugog but im going to be going next week and im going to try what everyone says and that is black and orange bucktails. good luck!
